bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
This <denchmark-link:https://streamlit.io/docs/tutorial/api.html#display-charts>link</denchmark-link> for supported charting libraries under the "Create a data explorer app" <denchmark-link:https://streamlit.io/docs/tutorial/create_a_data_explorer_app.html>tutorial</denchmark-link> is broken.
